Andy Green Visits Bentley Auckland

As part of Bentley's 'Mulsanne Visionaries' programme, Bentley Auckland was fortunate to host Wing Commander Andy Green for his first visit to New Zealand whilst on a Bentley Asia-Pacific tour. Andy Green has held the world land speed record for the last 15 years, achieving over 763mph in Thrust SSC. As part of the Bentley Mulsanne Visionaries series, he puts the car through its paces at the Bonneville Salt Flats in Utah, USA; the spiritual home of land speed records for close to half a century.

Andy represented Bentley and their vision for the future, attending two customer-based events for Giltrap Bentley Owners & VIPs. An evening dinner offered to an intimate group of Mulsanne owners and VIPs to privately dine with Andy and Bentley representative Robin Peel at The Grove Restaurant. On the following evening Bentley enthusiasts attended "An Audience with Andy Green" held in the Bentley Auckland showroom, where canapés and champagne was served while Andy and Shaun Summerfield (TV3) took part in a novel presentation and Q&A session with the audience.

Andy is an amazing ambassador for Bentley and we will be following his next endeavours to break his own world land speed record in the Bloodhound SSC challenge, scheduled for 2015. Click below to view more on Andy's role with Bentley and the Bentley Visionary program more broadly. Read more.

Bentley confirm SUV for 2016

Bentley Motors today confirms that it will proceed with the development of the Bentley SUV, the company's fourth model line. The SUV will be made in Crewe and will go on sale in 2016. Read more.

Bentley unveils the Continental GT3

Bentley unveils most extreme Continental ever, weighing 1,000 kg less than stock and boosted to 600 hp. The exterior of the car has been given a once over to improve aerodynamics, and the interior has been stripped down to the bare essentials for racing. Read more.

Bentley Celebrates Le Mans With Special Edition Continental And Mulsanne Models

Bentley is introducing six new 'Le Mans Limited Edition' specifications available on its flagship Mulsanne sedan and Continental range of coupes and convertibles. Read more.
 
  FIND OUT MORE  

The new Bentley Flying Spur

The new Bentley Flying Spur is a remarkable Luxury Sedan and not simply because of the incredible speeds it can reach. Designed for those who demand unrestrained luxury alongside uncompromising performance, it delivers the ultimate motoring experience, for driver and passengers alike.

From the sharp lines of its super-formed aluminium exterior to the hand-crafted hides and veneers that adorn the interior, the expertise of Bentley's craftsmen is evident throughout the new Flying Spur. Every seam in the A-Grade leather is individually sewn. Every layer of veneer is lacquered and polished by hand. The entire cabin, from the wood and the leather to the architecture that supports the car's digital technology has been fitted by hand.

While the 6 litre W12 engine can propel the new Flying Spur from 0-60 mph in 4.3 seconds and on to a top speed of 200 mph, the environment inside remains one of absolute calm - not least because of the specially-designed soundproofing installed in the floor and the doors.

The new Flying Spur is due to be on a national road-show in October. For any inquiries, click here to contact Bentley Sales.

Bentley indoor and outdoor car covers

In this issue of WO Bentley we offer a 15% discount on indoor and outdoor car covers.

These are available for the Continental range from 2005 onward.

These high quality covers come direct from the factory so to place an order or inquire your cars availability, email Bentley Parts Department here.
